AvailabilityPage.intervalDescription: The interval determines the time gaps between each available slot. For example, if you set the interval to 15 minutes, your available slots will be at 9:00, 9:15, 9:30, etc. We don't recommend an interval of less than 15 minutes to ensure you have enough time between sessions.
AvailabilityPage.clientsWillSee: Clients will see your available times four weeks in the future

ReminderEmail.subject: Upcoming Appointment Reminder
ReminderEmail.message: This is a friendly reminder that you have an upcoming appointment with {therapistName} on {date} at {time}. Please ensure that you are prepared and that your microphone and camera are functioning properly.

PaymentReminderEmail.subject: Reminder: Payment Required for Your Upcoming Appointment
PaymentReminderEmail.reminderText: This is a friendly reminder that payment for your upcoming appointment at {appointmentStartTime} is due.
PaymentReminderEmail.paymentInstructions: Please ensure that your payment is completed at least 1 hour before the scheduled time.

SmsReminder.reminderMessage: Reminder: Your appointment with {hostFirstName} {hostLastName} starts in 20 minutes at {appointmentTime}. Please be ready and ensure your microphone and video are working properly. You can join the meeting here: {meetingLink}

VerificationEmail.ignoreMessage: If you did not sign up for this account, please ignore this email.

NonPaidAppointmentConfirmationEmail.clientAdditionalMessage: Please note that this appointment needs to be paid for at least 1 hour before the meeting starts. You can make the payment using the link below. You can also join your upcoming session and see an overview of all your appointments on your appointments page.

PaidBookingConfirmationEmail.therapistAdditionalMessage: To join the session and manage all your appointments, please visit your appointments page.
PaidBookingConfirmationEmail.clientAdditionalMessage: You can join your upcoming session and see an overview of all your appointments on your appointments page.

ClientNotPaidInTimeEmail.clientSubject: Your Appointment Was Canceled Because Payment Was Not Made on Time
ClientNotPaidInTimeEmail.therapistSubject: Appointment Canceled: Client Did Not Pay on Time
ClientNotPaidInTimeEmail.notPaidInTimeMessageClient: Unfortunately, your appointment was canceled because you did not pay on time. Please make sure to pay in advance for future bookings.
ClientNotPaidInTimeEmail.notPaidInTimeMessageTherapist: The appointment with your client was canceled because the client did not pay on time. Please check your upcoming appointments.

MeetingLinkEmail.message: You have an upcoming appointment with {hostFirstName} {hostLastName} at {appointmentTime}.
MeetingLinkEmail.joinLink: Click here to join the meeting:

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to DAQIL, a telehealth platform providing therapy services to users around the world. These Terms and Conditions govern your access to and use of our services. By using our platform, you agree to comply with these Terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptanceOfTerms.heading: 2. Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.content: By registering for an account, using our services, or otherwise accessing the platform, you agree to these Terms and Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and any other legal notices or policies we provide.

eligibility.heading: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old or the age of majority in your jurisdiction to use our services. If you are using the platform on behalf of another individual (e.g., a minor), you represent that you have the legal authority to do so.

privacyAndDataProtection.heading: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
privacyAndDataProtection.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By agreeing to these Terms, you also agree to our Privacy Policy. We implement robust security measures, including data encryption, to protect your information.

useOfServices.heading: 5. Use of Services
useOfServices.content: Therapy Services: Our platform provides access to licensed therapists who offer therapy services. These services are provided directly by the therapists, and we act as a facilitator for connecting you with these professionals.

consentToRecording.heading: 6. Consent to Recording
consentToRecording.content: By agreeing to these Terms, you consent to the recording of your therapy sessions. These recordings are confidential and will only be used to improve our services and provide additional features, such as AI-driven journaling. We do not share your data with third parties unless required by law. You can review and manage your consent in your account settings.

paymentAndFees.heading: 7. Payment and Fees
paymentAndFees.content: Payment Processing: Payments for therapy sessions are processed through Stripe, our third-party payment service provider.

therapistConduct.heading: 8. Therapist Conduct
therapistConduct.content: We work with licensed and qualified therapists to provide the services. However, we do not supervise, direct, or control the professional judgment of therapists. If you have concerns about the services provided, please contact us at hello@daqil.com.

disclaimerOfLiability.heading: 9. Disclaimer of Liability
disclaimerOfLiability.content: Zakina Medtech Global provides a platform to connect users with licensed therapists. However, we do not supervise, direct, or control the professional judgment, actions, or advice provided by the therapists...

userResponsibilities.heading: 10. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating your account. Respect the confidentiality of your therapy sessions and any communications with therapists.

securityAndAccountProtection.heading: 11. Security and Account Protection
securityAndAccountProtection.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account login details. You must notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access to your account.

intellectualProperty.heading: 12. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, logos, and material provided on the platform are the intellectual property of Zakina Medtech Global or the therapists providing services.

limitationOfLiability.heading: 13. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Zakina Medtech Global will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of your use of the platform or services.

governingLaw.heading: 14. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates.

changesToTerms.heading: 15. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time.

contactUs.heading: 16. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at hello@daqil.com.
